name: Ghoul Kid
description: Play as Ghoul Kid, a mischievous ghost who possesses household objects to scare visitors to death. In this wave based game, Ghoul Kid cannot be seen by humans. Use your wits and abilities to manipulate household objects so you can scare people to death! Happy haunting!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Xbox controller supported

reviews.review_text: this game is lots of fun and simple to play! also, it's a bit spooky which is always nice. :3

7/10 would recommend  for bored players that look for a fun and sometimes hard game that doesn't take too long to play a couple rounds I remember a flash game with the same concept it was fun just like Ghoul Kid but this is less responsive and I'd suggest to change controls as soon as you get the game it's weird to go up and down clicking but that might be just me
Great game! It literally is about scaring people to death!

Camura doesn't agree with the players movements. Depth perception is horrible to play with and makes it harder than it should be to use the objects within the game.  Over all, i really like the gameplay and with work it could become a better one. If you want a new game to try, give this one a try.
That was fun for about 5 minutes, the controls are messy and it felt kind of like a phone game. It's entertaining but very repetitive, definitely worth the try since it's f2p however.
